greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A000005(A225546(n)), where A000005 gives the number of divisors of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A331309(n) = if(1==n,1,my(f=factor(n),u=#binary(vecmax(f[, 2])),prods=vector(u,x,1),m=1,e); for(i=1,u,for(k=1,#f~, if(bitand(f[k,2],m),prods[i] *= f[k,1])); m<<=1); prod(i=1,u,1+A048675(prods[i])));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jan 21 2020
